mua2fa.not_login_as_mua: Skip Logging in with MUA Authentication
mua2fa.not_login_as_mua_forever: Skip Logging in (Don't Remind me Again)
mua2fa.mua_request_hint:
Are you currently studying / graduated from a university in China Mainland / Hong Kong / Macao / Taiwan?
We recommend using MUA Authentication o complete the login process if you are.
mua2fa.complete_subtitle: Feel Free to Close the Window
mua2fa.cancel_subtitle: Please Reconnect to the Server and Try Again
